channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Police Sometimes Guess Wrong
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Harold Ward)
item.description: Tompkins confessed to planning to rob old Levi Jones, the money lender, and the janitor confessed to murder. But something was rotten in the state of Denmark. And I knew it!
